document.heading: Prevention of Child Abuse and Neglect Amendment Act of 2010

history.narrative: Law 18-312, the “Prevention of Child Abuse and Neglect Amendment Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-579, which was referred to the Committee on Human Services, Public Safety and the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 9, 2010, and November 23, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 13, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-633 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-312 became effective on March 12, 2011.
